content: This is not my coin not my project!Didn't find any announcements so making one. I think there should be one and it needs more attraction more miners.Here 's what I've found about this coin:name: Phloxcointicker: PHLOX maturity: 30max supply: 33,600,000p2p port: 2333rpc port: 2332halving: 840000block time: 5 minDiff time: 288 blocksblock reward: 20premined: 0algo: SCRYPT# ADDNODES:addnode=66.135.11.224:2333addnode=66.135.29.251:2333https://github.com/brimmen/phloxcoinhttp://66.135.29.251:3001/https://phloxcoin.org/https://discord.gg/X6GFBuN79ghttps://miningpoolstats.stream/phloxcoin

comments.author: QAnoncoin
comments.body: Quote from: ENGLAND$RUSSIA on June 15, 2023, 09:43:38 PMhttps://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/5565ccdcee30a08d1c211020fef6b849f49cbfaa50f5cc724b04b2b8704ded6a?nocache=1false positive. It always does that for old compiled coins forked from bitcoin or litecoin version v0.8.7.5 or below.Compile yourself a wallet from litecoin at this version https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/releases/tag/v0.8.6 and you will get same result.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: When its not your Coin or your Project @QAnoncoin why you are posting it and what you have to do with the Coin ?Next phishy and strange thing your Account woked up after long period not active and the first you are doing is making a Thread for an old coin thats useless.Also about the Detections here https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/5565ccdcee30a08d1c211020fef6b849f49cbfaa50f5cc724b04b2b8704ded6a?nocache=1 there maybe are a few false positive but not all like : Win32.Trojan.Agent.JZ7B9H , Artemis!69028D873FFA , Trojan.Generic@AI , Trojan.GenAsa!ZwOzrH5A2lo .I would say not to download or install the Wallet.

comments.author: QAnoncoin
comments.body: Quote from: Lafu on June 16, 2023, 01:52:23 AMWhen its not your Coin or your Project @QAnoncoin why you are posting it and what you have to do with the Coin ?Next phishy and strange thing your Account woked up after long period not active and the first you are doing is making a Thread for an old coin thats useless.Also about the Detections here https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/5565ccdcee30a08d1c211020fef6b849f49cbfaa50f5cc724b04b2b8704ded6a?nocache=1 there maybe are a few false positive but not all like : Win32.Trojan.Agent.JZ7B9H , Artemis!69028D873FFA , Trojan.Generic@AI , Trojan.GenAsa!ZwOzrH5A2lo .I would say not to download or install the Wallet.Because those I compiled them myself and didnt get any warnings at all from virustotal. While the one from phloxcoin I actually had the same result between my own compiled wallet and the official one. So I know it's safe. And by experience I always get this situation when using an old fork from litecoin or Bitcoin.If you compile it yourself you will see. Compile Litecoin v0.8.7.5 too and you'll get same result, even with the official litecoin code.But yeah, it's better not to install or use it if you do not trust it, I am not saying people SHOULD download it and use it, I'm only saying that from my experience I know it's false positive. I encourage people to compile the wallet themselves.

comments.author: brimmen
comments.body: I created this coin. I originally created a geltcoin a few years back . Anyway, so I created the compilation with gitian builder, but I have re-uploaded the mxe version, which is is not being flagged in virustotal now. https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/e9bba9c7abba454599d3cc39f9d2640d1b2af8c67c831206423282579c1e9cd7?nocache=1

Compile Litecoin v0.8.7.5 too and you'll get same result, even with the official litecoin code.But yeah, it's better not to install or use it if you do not trust it, I am not saying people SHOULD download it and use it, I'm only saying that from my experience I know it's false positive. I encourage people to compile the wallet themselves.You dont have to tell or explain how to compile things , i running a mining pool now over years and its bit strange that you make a topic and on the same wayyou writte not to download the wallet .Quote from: brimmen on June 16, 2023, 04:11:48 AMI created this coin. I originally created a geltcoin a few years back . Anyway, so I created the compilation with gitian builder, but I have re-uploaded the mxe version, which is is not being flagged in virustotal now. https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/e9bba9c7abba454599d3cc39f9d2640d1b2af8c67c831206423282579c1e9cd7?nocache=1Its getting more and more strange and suspicious in here that first the one that created the topic waked up for a long time and the first thing is to create this Topic.After that the Account that havnt posted anything since June 25, 2019, is also posting here and waked up since 2019.For me it looks like that both Accounts got Hacked and try to get some Users that believe your shit you writting and all.Very , very suspicious all here.

comments.body: Let's not discuss whether your code has a large number of Trojan horsesWhat I'm curious about is: WHY BORY FORK THIS WRITER PROJECT?What is his point?Simple FORKboring forkThen what?The last spam exchange cheated money?or something else?inexplicable cottageWhat is his starting point for FORK?Have this time, go read a book, listen to music, enjoy the afternoon sunIsn't he fragrant?Come to post a boring FORKThen argue with others whether this code has a virusboring

I think there should be one and it needs more attraction more miners.Here 's what I've found about this coin:name: Phloxcointicker: PHLOX maturity: 30max supply: 33,600,000p2p port: 2333rpc port: 2332halving: 840000block time: 5 minDiff time: 288 blocksblock reward: 20premined: 0algo: SCRYPT# ADDNODES:addnode=66.135.11.224:2333addnode=66.135.29.251:2333https://github.com/brimmen/phloxcoinhttp://66.135.29.251:3001/https://phloxcoin.org/https://discord.gg/X6GFBuN79ghttps://miningpoolstats.stream/phloxcoinWho are the developers and why they have not tried to reach out to community themselves?
